name: Onimusha Tactics (Wii U)
description:
Prepare to be thrust into massive, old world feudal battles where every
move is a struggle for power. Join Onimaru, a young Ogre Clan warrior on
a mighty quest to defeat Nobunaga and his enemy Genma armies.

Call upon your demon power and sword skills to fight against evil
legions. Manage your resources and equipment, assemble your allies and
enhance your troops by adding the strongest warriors. Utilize the field
map for strategy, troop improvement and tactical advantages to defeat
your enemy. Nobunaga must be stopped!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
